        private final E[] buffer;

        public E next() {
            E e = this.nextElement;
            if (e == null) {
                throw new NoSuchElementException();
            }
            this.nextElement = getNext();
            return e;
        }

        private E getNext() {
            E e;
            do {
                long j = this.nextIndex;
                if (j >= this.pIndex) {
                    return null;
